byline.contributor: Enid Nemy and Daniel E. Slotnik contributed reporting.

abstract: Happy Rockefeller, whose marriage to New York Gov Nelson A Rockefeller in 1963 may have caused him to lose Republican presidential nomination, dies at age 88; Rockefellers had both been recently divorced at time of their marriage, which caused controversy at the time.
lead_paragraph: She and Gov. Nelson A. Rockefeller of New York married soon after both had been divorced, kicking up a political storm that may have cost him the Republican presidential nomination in 1964.

headline.main: Happy Rockefeller, 88, Dies; Marriage to Governor Scandalized Voters
headline.print_headline: Happy Rockefeller, 88, Whose Marriage to Governor Scandalized Voters, Dies

snippet: She and Gov. Nelson A. Rockefeller of New York married soon after both had been divorced, kicking up a political storm that may have cost him the Republican presidential nomination in 1964.
